dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertain situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold action and seize opportunities without hesitation.
Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and avoid risk to maintain stability.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions to others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely share their feelings and thoughts without holding back.
Your FarTwin will maintain a stoic demeanor and keep emotions private.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach making decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and gut feelings to guide their choices.
Your FarTwin will carefully analyze data and evidence before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with strangers?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new people with warmth and friendliness.
Your FarTwin will be reserved and hesitant to engage with strangers.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn through practical experience and experimentation.
Your FarTwin will prefer to learn from abstract concepts and theories.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will stand their ground and assertively express their opinions.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and find mutually beneficial solutions.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity into visual art, music, or other forms of self-expression.
Your FarTwin will explore their creative side through writing, storytelling, or role-playing.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle challenging tasks with enthusiasm and energy.
Your FarTwin will focus on completing tasks in a timely and organized manner.
